title: Kirstin Lyon
text: Kirstin is a data analyst with experience in Tableau, R, and PowerBI. Her work focuses on analysing and visualising data to support decision-making, particularly in the field of public health. Kirstin enjoys simplifying complex datasets and creating clear, informative visualisations that help others understand and use data effectively

Professional Experience
      
      
      Data Analyst
      Project Manager / PMO
      
      
      Education
      Tools, Langauges & Datasets
      Teaching, Presentation & User Groups
